name: Blind World
description:
Blind World is a puzzle platformer game where the world is only black. To see the world you've to produce a colorfully sonic which it's work like radar but you can't always produce sonic because there is mana bar for sonic.

There are 20 black unvisible levels and they're waiting for you!

This game was made in 2015 and will be not updated anymore. I hope you've fun by playing Blind World!

Keys:

WASD: Movement

Space: Produce Sonic

You can also change the key mapping by pressing F9 at start menu.
